title: When Xiaoxiang Guys Meet A Jinjiang Girl - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Parody   Proactive Protagonist   Royalty
author: Tian Jiu   天鸠
description:
This is a story about how a female character in Jinjiang made others suffer after having discovered her tragic fates under the pen of the author. 

The protagonist says, “If I’m thrown into misfortunes by heaven, I’ll have to turn the entire world into tragedies.

The lord, king, general, scholar, master of evil cult who don’t do anything important, but only talk about s*x or love, will have to pay direly.

If you don’t go to hell, who will?”

In an illogical place like this, where any bizzarre things can happen out of nowhere, the heroine will transform into the Ultra(wo)man, fend off ugly monsters and keenly twist sufferings into honor.

Note: Xiaoxiang (xxsy) & Jinjiang (jjwxc) are 2 largest web literature sites for Chinese novels. Xiaoxiang novels often have male leads lacking ethics & noble qualities => slag heroes>
